rukus.text: He imandarasakala! Tomalokara dhana-sampada arau santana-santati yate tomalokaka allahara smaranara paraa udasina nakarae; arau yihamta enekuraa udasina ha’ba sihamte'i ksatigrasta

Arau ma'i tomalokaka yi jiraika dana karaicho tomalokara ocarata mrtyu ahara agate tara paraa byaya karaa, (karana mrtyu ahara pichata si ka’ba) he mora pratipalaka! ‘Moka arau kichu samayara babe arakasa dile ma'i chadakba karailohemtena arau satkarmaparaayanasakalara antarbhukta ha’lohemtena’
Arau yetiya karaobara nirdista samaya upasthita ha’ba, tetiya allahe taka ketiya'o arakasa nidiba. Tomaloke yi amala karaa se'i samparke allaha sabisesa aragata
